org.kepler.ssh

Class SftpExec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.ssh.RemoteExec
      • org.kepler.ssh.SshExec
        • org.kepler.ssh.SftpExec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecInterface

    public class SftpExec
extends SshExec
    Class to handle file transfer based on sftp protocol. It uses the Jsch package to transfer files from local to remote host or remote host to local machine. It extends SshExec and uses its method to execute a sftp command in batch mode to transfer files between two remote machines

    Author:
    Chandrika Sivaramakrishnan Based on - JSch examples http://www.jcraft.com/jsch and SshExec code written by Norbert Podhorszki
    See Also:
    SshExec

    • Method Detail

      • copyFrom

        public int copyFrom(java.lang.String rfile,
                    java.io.File localPath,
                    boolean recursive)
             throws SshException
        Copies file/directory from a remote machine to local machine using Jsch sftp channel. Since the sftp command is not directly used any command line options set in the super class will be ignored.
        Specified by:
        copyFrom in interface ExecInterface
        Overrides:
        copyFrom in class SshExec
        Parameters:
        rfile - - remote file that should be copied to local machine
        localPath - - path into to which the source file should be copied
        recursive - - flag to represent recursive copy of a directory
        Returns:
        number of files copied successfully SshException is thrown in case of error.
        Throws:
        SshException

        public int copyTo(java.io.File lfile,

           throws SshException
        Copies files/directories from local machine to remote host
        Specified by:
        copyTo in interface ExecInterface
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        targetPath - - path on remote host into to which the file should be copied
        recursive - - flag to represent recursive copy of a directory
        Returns:

        Throws:
        SshException

      • getRecursiveCopyCmd

        public java.lang.String getRecursiveCopyCmd(java.lang.String srcFile,
                                            java.lang.String destFile,
                                            boolean isConnectionOrigin)
                                     throws SshException
        Returns the list of sftp commands (combination of "mkdir" and "put" commands) that are required to recursively copy a directory.
        Parameters:
        srcFile - - source file to be copied
        destFile - - destination directory
        isConnectionOrigin -
        Returns:
        command - String representing the list of commands seperated by \n character
        Throws:
        SshException
